name: M576NGA
description: Regarded by many as the quintessential NB shoe, the 576  incorporates everything that makes Flimby's finest so great. This  edition marks the 25th anniversary of the classic 576 with a re-issue in  its original colourway. As always the shoe features the famous C-Cap  cushioning system and large N on the side. The uppers are constructed  from a premium brushed pigskin and mesh combination, and still made in  Flimby. This shoe is a true classic in any guise.
